commit.message:
re PR bootstrap/64612 (profiledbootstrap failures)


	PR ipa/64612
	* ipa-inline-transform.c (can_remove_node_now_p): Fix handling
	of comdat locals.
	(inline_call): Fix removal of aliases.

From-SVN: r219696

+	of comdat locals.
+	(inline_call): Fix removal of aliases.
